name: LuckyDigits
description:
Gambling guess game made my Sebastian Rossi, runs on every computer, PC and Mac. The game is just a project (but working and totally playable) that was introduced in a school and that have been just revised a couple time after that. 

The game consist in guessing the number that the AI is putting on the table. If you guess right you get the money that you played before making a guess, If you guess wrong your money will be given to the AI. The game is in english and has an italian translation.

If you want to try the game out you can try to contact me.
If you want to buy the copyrights of the game, the project and everything correlated to it you can write to me or pay the price written below.

The game is addicting, play at your own risk.
